title: AI FFmpeg Online · Simple Online Audio/Video Processing Tool
quote: There's no audio/video problem that FFmpeg can't solve. If there is, it means your command isn't long enough.

videoTranscode.title: Video Transcoding
videoTranscode.description: Support multiple format conversions, such as MP4, WebM, etc.

videoCompression.title: Video Compression
videoCompression.description: Adjust bitrate and resolution to reduce file size

videoCrop.title: Video Cropping
videoCrop.description: Crop video duration and frame size

basicEffects.title: Basic Effects
basicEffects.description: Adjust basic parameters like brightness and contrast

uploader.dragText: Drag and drop video files here

processor.promptLabel: Describe how you want to process the video
processor.promptPlaceholder: Example: trim first 10 seconds, adjust resolution to 1080p
processor.promptTip: Tip: You can provide specific parameters like video duration, resolution, etc.
